Search database of site names

search_lakes.Rd

Searches the listing of UK CEH Lakes Portal sites to find names that contain the string provided.

The search is done on an internal copy of the UK lakes listing rather than connecting to the UKCEH Lakes Portal site.

Usage

search_lakes(string = NULL)

Arguments

string

The search string to be matched (case-sensitive). Will match whole or partial strings in the column values. #'

Value

A data frame containing the details (Name & wbid) of all the sites that match the search string (full or partial matches).

Examples

# search for sites containing "Tarn" in the name
search_lakes("Tarn")
#>                                Name  wbid
#> 1                       Tarnie Loch 23031
#> 2                       Talkin Tarn 28386
#> 3                      Tindale Tarn 28395
#> 4                       Martin Tarn 28561
